[03:33] <sonny_bill_9> not funny [03:33] <Yz85Racer> tubby [03:33] <sonny_bill_9> FAIL [03:34] <AnoHito> oh, god [03:34] <AnoHito> he's using mems! [03:34] <Yz85Racer> lol [03:34] <AnoHito> run!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! [03:34] <AnoHito> RUNNING OF THE NIGGERS [03:34] <Yz85Racer> sonny_bill_9, is trying to be cool with fail [03:34] <Yz85Racer> haha [03:34] <AnoHito> RUNNING OF THE FAT NIGGERS FROM TOO MUCH CHICKEN [03:34] <Yz85Racer> especially when hes new [03:34] <Yz85Racer> lmfao [03:34] <AnoHito> RUNNING OF THE NIGGER-EATING CHICKEN [03:34] <sonny_bill_9> im not trying to be I+ cool [03:34] <Yz85Racer> stfu fatboy [03:34] <AnoHito> oh man, that was an epic fail [03:34] <Yz85Racer> play some sport [03:35] <AnoHito> you just used a non-existing control code [03:35] <AnoHito> to fake italics [03:35] <AnoHito> sonny_bill_9: I promise to leave you alone if you do one thing for me. [03:40] <AnoHito> There we go. I win. [03:40] <-- sonny_bill_9 has left this server (Connection reset by peer). [03:40] <AnoHito> Time to post this on MITB.[hr]What happens on IRC at 3:47 to 3:48?

item.title: What happens on IRC at 3:20 to 3:41 AM?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Kamu, post:43, topic:153816”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=210185.msg1847153#msg1847153 date=1193474803]
I didn’t mention identity in there at all. I didn’t mention that whites should get anything more then blacks either.

What I did say, in short, is that things in the world these days are either exclusively for blacks, or for both blacks and whites - there’s nothing for whites only.
[/quote]

Cmon Lothy! Just take solace in the fact that Australians completely fucked up the aboriginal people! Next time you get mad at Aboriginals getting a welfare hand out just think to yourself “Boy did we fuck those bastards up something awesome! :D!”. Much like killing some kid’s mother in front of him and giving him a tenner for the trouble.[/quote]
The thing I hate most about aboriginals is that they, in essence, want me to apologise to them. They want me, and other Australians, to apologise, as if we were the perpetrators.

Why the fuck should I feel the least bit responsible for something that my grandfather’s father may have taken part in?
Why should my children be made to feel guilty in the least? They don’t even exist yet (assuming I get married and have children :rolleyes:)

[quote=“ThugLife, post:42, topic:153816”][quote author=Lothy link=topic=210185.msg1847153#msg1847153 date=1193474803]
I didn’t mention identity in there at all. I didn’t mention that whites should get anything more then blacks either.

What I did say, in short, is that things in the world these days are either exclusively for blacks, or for both blacks and whites - there’s nothing for whites only.
[/quote]
There is not now, but there was years ago.[/quote]
Doesn’t mean that I, or anyone else, should feel that we have to be second, just to make it up to them. ‘Years ago’ - back in the 40s, 50s, 60s, 70s when that was the case, I wasn’t around to enjoy it.
See my reply to Kamu.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens on IRC at 3:20 to 3:41 AM?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

So let me get this straight, you advocate equal rights for people of all races, but you want whites to have privileges that other races don’t? Get fucked, to be honest. Nationalism has gone crazy in the last few years, and it’s not good for society.

“Oh but black people take our identity and keep their own”.

One word. Hip hop. Most modern popular music derives from HipHop in some way. Are we stealing blacks identity by creating a culture influenced by theirs? No.

Arguments like Lothy’s are why I hate people.

Read full topic

@goatee wrote:

Lothy, you can’t qualify for the list to go on with only two things, you need to say “For example there are gorrilaz, chimps, black people, the list goes on” You need three or more things!

“there’s not a single thing that’s for whites only.”
Ever been to the restaurant “Quintessentially Caucasian”, they have white toilet attendants.

item.title: What happens on IRC at 3:20 to 3:41 AM?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:29, topic:153816”]My conclusion -

                   Too many rednecks (who are sometimes racist). What moron screams the 'N'-word on IRC for no reason?

EDIT: Not all rednecks are racist…Damn it are you happy?[/quote]
Define racism. Does it even have a solid definition these days? I’d be surprised if people all had the same understanding of the word.
The reality these days is that white people, as a whole, feel too guilty for their actions in the past. That being the case, there’s all sorts of stuff for black people these days.
Black college funds, aboriginal welfare (aboriginals are black), and the list goes on. Everything these days is either just for blacks, or for both whites and blacks - there’s not a single thing that’s for whites only.

Tell me the last time you saw someone call a black person racist when he yelled out ‘snowflake’, ‘whitey’, or something along those lines - you don’t, because blacks can do virtually anything these days, and they won’t be prosecuted because whites have been forced to believe that they’re guilty.
White students in Australia study Aboriginals and their culture almost every year throughout their high school lives. I can tell you more about the abos and their stone-age lifestyles then I can about white society and its achievements throughout the ages. There’s something wrong with the education system if I know more about someone else’s past then I do my own.
On a final note, aboriginals (and probably other black societies) expect an apology. They want ME to apologise. What did I do?

So please, give the racism shit a rest. You really have no idea.

Read full topic
